公司名稱: 飛輪電商有限公司
description:
【Hour Loop 飛輪電商】在2013年成立，並於2022年初在美國那斯達克上市。作為亞馬遜 (Amazon) 電商平台第三方賣家，我們的工作不只廠商開發，還包括商品上架、價格制定，以及物流與庫存管理，通通一手包辦。
在電商世界的百萬競爭對手中，我們透過獨特的營運模式，成功實現十年來的持續成長，並脫穎而出，在2023年底躍升為亞馬遜 (Amazon) 前十名的賣家！
我們提供彈性且暢通的職涯管道，讓你站上國際電商舞台。我們不綁年資，端看績效表現，從「獨立貢獻者」到「管理職」適性發展！如果你喜歡打磨自身專業能力，鑽研獨立的電商工作項目，便適合獨立貢獻者的角色；若你有準確遠見，善於溝通和帶領團隊，你可能就是未來的帶人主管！
1. 職涯發展管道：入職新人由專案助理 （Project Assistant）職位任用，於入職前即確認未來任職團隊，入職後有兩個月針對亞馬遜或其他電商平台等完整教育訓練。通過考核後依據部門類別晉升或轉任職務。
(1) 晉升為 業務開發部 專案經理（Business Development Department - Project Manager）：負責發展Amazon以外的其他平台，如Walmart, eBay, Shopify，從無到有拓產新的產品通路，提高商品利潤。
(2) 晉升為 營運部 專案經理（Operations Department - Project Manager）：與業務團隊合作，支援電商後台營運與成本控管，必備技能是獨立解決問題和設計及改善流程的能力。
(3) 轉任為 營運部 經理（Manager）：作為6至10人的主管，制定團隊營運目標，監督與管理成員績效。定期與成員一對一面談（one-on-one）調整工作內容與激勵員工士氣。
2. 業務開發部與營運部團隊職務分配
(1) 業務開發部（Business Development）：拓展產品通路，提高商品利潤。子團隊如：廣告投放、通路開發、產品分析管理等。
(2) 營運部（Operations）：降低營運成本，優化貿易流程。子團隊如：訂單審核、物流管理、倉儲管理、客服與品質管理、產品上架管理等。
工作團隊任務簡述：
a. 廣告投放：操作亞馬遜平台廣告，如：投放預算、點擊價格與關鍵字
b. 通路開發：開發並營運亞馬遜之外等其他電商平台，達成銷售額之成長
c. 產品上架管理：撰寫產品簡介、設計關鍵字、修正網頁錯誤資訊與產品圖片維護
d. 產品分析管理：開發潛力電商商品及協助業務制定進貨策略，以維持庫存數量
e. 訂單審核：審核採購訂單並調整商品售價以符合銷售策略
f. 物流管理：倉庫及海運貨櫃進出口安排，包含庫存管理、訂艙、稅金、進出口程序等
g. 倉儲管理：整握全公司庫存庫齡概況，透過調價及不同促銷手法維持庫存健康程度
h. 客服與品質管理：針對限制性產品及高退貨率產品處理及建立預防機制
3.教育訓練規劃
(1) 業務開發部（Business Development）：針對各電商平台特性與需求安排學習內容，包含基本日常營運操作、銷售預測分析、毛利優化策略等，以利後續發展有效成長策略訂定基礎。
(2) 營運部（Operations）：於訂單審核團隊（Order Review Team）進行部門訓練，審核採購訂單並依據季節性需求調整商品進貨數量，優化審核系統流程及制定電商銷售策略。
4. 工作職責
(1)負責制定與監控任務流程，並確保能符合公司規劃。
(2)具備設計、開發和發想創新解決方案的能力。
(3)具備良好的解決問題、創造力和簡化能力，並擁有良好的溝通和書寫技巧。
(4)能有效設計和優化標準作業程序，維持高效率產出。
職稱: 電商數據分析 - 台北市
major: ['商業及管理學科類', '語文及人文學科類', '經濟社會及心理學科類']
專長工具: Excel, Tableau, Power BI​, Looker studio

公司名稱: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
description:
<About the job> 
As the Senior Data Engineer or Data Architect, you'll join the various advanced Data Science & AI Projects in the corporate headquarters. As well as developing intelligent applications via related AI and Big Data Analytics Technology for digital transformation, you will have plenty of opportunities to develop emerging applications based on different use cases and expand your tech skillset in this world-class company (Fortune Global 500, 20th).

<Job Description>
*Type 1：Senior Data Engineer
Responsible for acquiring data using API, Web scraping, or other data accessing protocol/scripting and developing the ETL data pipelines, and the data aggregation systems. Using software development experience to design and build high-performance automated systems. As below:
1. Data Processing
(1)Data ETL(Extracting/Transforming/Loading) process engineering and querying from relational data management(such as SQL Script).
(2)Building systematic data quality processes and checks to ensure data quality and accuracy.
(3)Solid coding experience in Python or Java.

2. Data Pipeline Development
(1)Develops a data integration process, including creating scalable data pipelines and building out data services/data APIs.
(2)Create a data processing automation and monitoring mechanism by optimizing the data pipeline process. 
(3)Experience with dataflow/workflow/management tools, such as Apache Nifi, Apache Airflow, Azkaban, etc., is preferred.

3. Data Crawling
(1)Build scalable tools that automate web crawling, scraping, and data aggregation from various web pages using frameworks such as Scrapy.
(2)Accessing data from REST APIs, particularly in parsing data in disparate formats such as JSON and XML, and developing automated engineering. 
(3) (Nice to Have) Knowledge of server-based front-end/UI technologies, including Vue/React and HTML/CSS, is preferred.

*Type 2：Data Architect
Responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable and reusable system architectures/data architectures for complex data structures and large data in data science and AI projects. As below:
1. Data Schema Design
(1)Collaborate with the team to design DB/Table Schema and Data Schema.
(2)Consolidate the requirements and use data engineering tech to design and implement a robust Data Mart. 
(3)Experience handling all kinds of structured/semi-structured/unstructured data and streaming data is preferred.
(4)Hands-on experience with Dimensional Data Modeling(Column-based data warehouse) or NoSQL Schema design.

2. Data Platform Architecture
(1)Design and build data infrastructure/platform components to support complex data pipelines ingesting various data from multiple internal and external data sources and processing.
(2)Familiar with Big Data frameworks and processing technologies, ex: Hadoop, Apache Spark, NoSQL ...etc.
(3)Familiar with AZURE or AWS cloud data services(hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure will be a plus)
(4)Familiarity with the Linux OS environment, the Shell Scripting, and infrastructure knowledge. 
(5)(Nice to Have)Experience with declarative infrastructure/container technologies, such as Docker and Kubernetes (k8s/k3s). (Nice to Have).
職稱: 資深數據工程師 Senior Data Engineer/Data Architect (Data Science & AI Team)

公司名稱: 全曜財經資訊股份有限公司
description:
【BigData Team】
At CMoney, our mission is to assist people in their lifelong investment. To this end, we have already launched several services and apps to help users make decisions on different matters. CMoney has the most popular stock mobile app and stock forum in Taiwan. So far our stock forum has had more than 450k monthly active users, and all of our products have had almost 3 million monthly active users. Everyday more than 100k articles and messages emerge from our apps and forum. Meanwhile, we collaborate with 50+ investment KOLs to help users succeed in investment. Currently, CMoney is at the fast-growing stage, and thus we are looking for brilliant talents to join our team, especially the ones with integrity, high social interest and a growing mindset. For more detail of CMoney, please refer to the following link: https://cmy.tw/00BWhP.

Our Big Data team focuses on implementing the business intelligence platform to support multiple internal partner teams to meet their operational needs. We are responsible for establishing processes for continual improvement, crafting data and reporting solutions at large scale. Our mission is to keep our business running optimally while maintaining a balanced application environment.

As a member of the Big Data team, you will build and own mission-critical data pipelines as well as modern data warehouse solutions while collaborating closely with Data Science, Marketing, and Product teams.

You will be a part of an early stage team and have a significant stake in defining its future with a considerable potential to impact all of CMoney's revenue and millions of users. Your efforts will reveal invaluable business and user insights to fuel revenue by leveraging vast amounts of data.

【Must have】
1. B.S. and/or M.S. in Computer Science or related field.
2. Broad knowledge of the data infrastructure ecosystem.
3. Experience with Hadoop or other MapReduce-based architectures.
4. Good understanding of one or more of the following programming languages on Scala.
5. Experience with large-scale data warehousing architecture and data modeling.
6.  Experience with real-time streaming：Apache Kafka, Apache Beam, Heron, Spark 
Streaming.

【Plus】
1. Experience working with large data volumes.
2. Experience writing Big Data pipelines, as well as custom or structured ETL, 
implementation and maintenance.
3. Experience with Druid or Apache Flink.
4. Ability in managing and communicating data warehouse project plans to internal 
clients.

3. CloudTrail：熟悉 Event data store，能建立 Data event，有 log filter parsing 實作經驗，了解使用 EMR 透過 Lake Formation 權控去 Query 存在 S3 資料的方法。

6. 基礎配置知識和設計經驗：包括對 infra 面配置的了解，如 Redshift、EMR 等 node type 數量評估和配置建議。了解各服務的高可用和資安配置，如 S3 安全相關的配置(如啟用 SSE)，以及 Traffic 管理等。

description:
About KICKS CREW

Launched in January 2021, KICKS CREW is a leading global platform for authentic athletic footwear and sportswear. While the industry is hunger-marketing and scarcity driven, our mission is to democratize sneaker culture, making it inclusive and accessible to all consumers.

With world class investor backing (Gobi Partners, AEF and Pacific Century Group), we have been scaling our team with the best talent. In October 2022 KICKS CREW also announced a partnership with 6X NBA Super star Damian Lillard as an investor and first CREW athlete.

Responsibilities:
‧	Design, build, and maintain scalable and efficient data pipelines on the Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
‧	Develop data processing and transformation workflows using Python and SQL.
‧	Collaborate with stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
‧	Implement data modelling and transformation to enable advanced analytics and reporting.
‧	Integrate and extract data from Shopify or other e-commerce platforms.
‧	Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines, ensuring data quality, integrity, and availability.
‧	Implement and maintain data governance and security best practices.
‧	Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies in the data engineering space.
‧	Work with databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, BigQuery) to design and optimize data models and queries

Requirements:
‧	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
‧	1+ years of professional experience as a Data Engineer
‧	Strong experience working with the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) ecosystem, including tools such as BigQuery, Dataflow, and Cloud Storage.
‧	Proficiency in Python programming and SQL.
‧	Solid understanding of data modelling concepts and experience with data transformation using SQL.
‧	Knowledge of dbt or similar tools for data modellng and transformation is a plus.
‧	Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
‧	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
‧	Strong attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
‧	Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)

Nice to haves:
‧	Familiarity with data orchestration tools such as Airflow or Prefect
‧	Familiarity with data modeling tools such as dbt
‧	Familiarity with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Looker, or Power BI.
‧	Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
‧	Familiarity with Shopify or other e-commerce platforms
‧	Experience with microservices architecture and event-driven systems
‧	Knowledge of RESTful/GraphQL and its implementation in a backend environment
‧	Basic understanding of data distribution processing engine
‧	Previous experience in an e-commerce or retail industry
‧	Business-level English proficiency (B2 or above)

公司名稱: 奕界科技有限公司
description:
We are a dynamic game development company dedicated to creating engaging and innovative gaming experiences through our proprietary brands. Our primary focus is on integrating our services with third-party operators and platforms, allowing players worldwide to enjoy our games. We are currently expanding our data management capabilities to support our back-office reporting and business analytics.

# Responsibilities
1. Design and implement database architecture utilizing PostgreSQL for transactional data and MongoDB/DynamoDB for session and game round data.
2. Develop and maintain strategies for data lifecycle management, including procedures for migrating data from hot to cold storage.
3. Set up and optimize data warehousing solutions using technologies such as AWS Redshift.
4. Prepare and maintain data structures to support BI initiatives with tools like Tableau.
5. Monitor database performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement optimization strategies to ensure efficiency.
6. Identify and resolve database deadlocks and other performance bottlenecks.
7. Implement high-availability solutions for business-critical databases.
8. Design and maintain robust backup and recovery procedures.
9. Work closely with development teams to optimize database queries and schema designs.
10. Document database architecture, procedures, and best practices for future reference and compliance.

# Qualifications
1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
2. 5+ years of experience as a Database Administrator.
3. Strong expertise in PostgreSQL administration, optimization, and SQL query optimization.
4. Experience with NoSQL databases, specifically MongoDB and/or DynamoDB.
5. Proven experience with AWS cloud services, particularly RDS and Redshift.
6. Knowledge of data warehousing concepts, their implementation, and experience with BI tools like Tableau or similar platforms.
7. Strong understanding of database security best practices and experience with database monitoring and alerting tools.
8. Familiarity with Apache Iceberg or other data lake solutions.
9. Understanding of data protection and privacy regulations.
10. Proficiency with automation and scripting for database management tasks.
11. Certification in relevant database technologies.
12. Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
13. Experience in the gaming or iGaming industry is a plus.

description:
【職務目標｜Job Objective】
負責多源資料整合與轉換處理，建立穩定、可擴展之資料流架構，支援企業智慧分析與跨部門 AI 應用之資料需求。
Responsible for integrating and transforming multi-source industrial data to build stable and scalable data pipelines that support enterprise-wide analytics and cross-functional AI initiatives.


【工作內容｜Responsibilities】
1.整合感測資料（如設備、環境與營運參數），設計結構化資料流與清洗機制。
Integrate sensor data (e.g., equipment, environmental, and operational parameters) and design structured data pipelines with cleaning mechanisms.

2.建立資料品質檢查、缺值補全與異常篩選邏輯，提升資料可用性與穩定性。
Develop logic for data quality validation, missing value imputation, and anomaly filtering to ensure reliable and consistent datasets.

3.撰寫與維運資料前處理流程、API、資料庫表結構與查詢接口。
Develop and maintain data preprocessing workflows, APIs, database schemas, and query interfaces.

4.協助資料可視化平台建置與維運，支援現場操作或決策單位即時監控與檢視。
Assist in the development and maintenance of data visualization platforms to support real-time monitoring and insights.

5.與 AI 團隊協作，提供模型所需之特徵資料與時間對齊資料流。
Collaborate with AI teams to provide model-ready features and time-aligned data streams.

【基本條件｜Requirements】
1.熟悉 Python / SQL，具備資料處理、清洗、格式轉換等實作經驗。
Proficient in Python and SQL, with hands-on experience in data transformation and cleaning.

2.熟悉時間序列資料與串流資料處理（如 Kafka、InfluxDB、TimeScaleDB）。
Familiar with time-series and streaming data processing (e.g., Kafka, InfluxDB, TimeScaleDB).

3.具備資料庫設計與 REST API 實作經驗。
Experienced in database schema design and REST API development.

4.了解製造業 OT / IoT 系統資料結構與傳輸機制者優先。
Knowledge of OT/IoT system data structures and communication protocols in manufacturing environments is preferred.
職稱: 製造資料工程師（Manufacturing Data Engineer）
專長工具: Python, IoT, MES, Git, EDA, Github, MySQL, AWS, TCP/IP, Power BI​

公司名稱: ViewSonic Corporation_優派國際股份有限公司
description:
Role Description:

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Data Engineer to join our growing data team. In this role, you will be instrumental in building and maintaining our data infrastructure, ensuring the efficient and reliable data flow for analysis and reporting. You will collaborate closely with data scientists, analysts, and other engineers to develop and implement data pipelines, optimize data storage, and contribute to the overall data strategy.

This is an excellent opportunity for an early-career to mid-level professional to gain hands-on experience in a dynamic and data-driven environment.

Responsibilities:

-Data Pipeline Development and Maintenance:
-Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable data pipelines using Python and Airflow.
-Extract, transform, and load (ETL/ELT) data from various sources into our data warehouse.
-Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues, ensuring data integrity and reliability.
-Data Storage and Management:
-Assist in the design and implementation of efficient data storage solutions on AWS.
-Optimize database performance and contribute to data governance practices.
-Maintain data schemas, data dictionaries, and documentation.

Cloud Infrastructure (AWS):
-Utilize AWS services such as S3, EMR, Redshift, and EC2 for data storage and processing.
-Participate in the deployment and management of cloud-based data infrastructure.
-Monitor and optimize cloud resource usage for cost-effectiveness and performance.
-Collaboration and Communication:
-Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and engineers to understand data requirements.
-Collaborate cross-functionally to deliver reliable data solutions for analytics and product needs.
-Document processes and communicate progress clearly to stakeholders.



Required Skills:

Programming & Data Engineering:
-Proficiency in Python, with strong command of data manipulation libraries such as Pandas and NumPy.
-Solid understanding of Hadoop and PySpark, with experience building distributed data processing workflows.
-Experience with Apache Airflow for orchestrating and managing data workflows.

Cloud & Data Systems:
-Familiarity with Amazon Web Services (AWS), especially S3, EMR, Redshift, and EC2.
-Understanding of ETL processes, relational databases, and data warehousing concepts.
-Experience managing large-scale datasets and optimizing performance in distributed environments.

Soft Skills:
-Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking.
-Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
-Ability to learn quickly and adapt to evolving technologies.
-High attention to detail and a structured, process-oriented mindset.


Preferred Qualifications (Nice to Have):

-Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related technical field.
-Hands-on experience with dbt for building and maintaining data transformation models.
-Experience working on LLM (Large Language Model) or AI-related projects, such as model integration, fine-tuning, or deploying AI-powered features in production.
-Familiarity with data modeling best practices and version control (e.g., Git).
-Knowledge of data visualization tools such as Power BI or similar platforms.
職稱: 資料工程師, Data Engineer, Presentation Group

公司名稱: Gogoro Taiwan Limited_睿能創意股份有限公司
description:
Position Impact:

    The Data Scientist turns business questions into data problems—and data problems into actionable solutions. This role requires not only building accurate and interpretable models, but also understanding the business context deeply enough to ask the right questions, define meaningful metrics, simulate possible outcomes, and recommend the best path forward.
    At Data Office, the Data Scientist works closely with analysts, engineers, and business stakeholders to solve problems using structured data. You are expected to work with curated datasets to build training pipelines, define appropriate evaluation methods, and ensure that model results are explainable. You’ll engage in exploratory data analysis to identify patterns, detect anomalies, and uncover insights that might otherwise go unnoticed. Your work supports decision-making through prediction and simulation.
    The ideal candidate is analytical, curious, and outcome-oriented. You bring strong Python skills, hands-on experience with data manipulation tools like Pandas, and a solid understanding of statistics and machine learning. You are able to clearly communicate model results to diverse audiences, take full ownership of your work, and collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams.

Roles & Responsibilities:

1. Conduct exploratory data analysis to identify patterns, anomalies, and potential opportunities.
2. Develop and implement models or methodologies to solve a wide range of business problems, such as customer behavior prediction, battery management, and charging station deployment.
3. Develop modeling pipelines—from feature engineering, model training and selection to model deployment.
4. Design validation strategies and ensure the robustness of model outputs.
5. Interpret model forecasting into business-relevant insights, assumptions, and trade-offs.
職稱: Data Office_Data Scientist
專長工具: Python, MS SQL, scikit-learn, PyTorch, tensorflow

description:
【About the Role】

We are looking for a hands-on Data Engineer with strong expertise in the AWS data ecosystem to support the design, development, and optimization of modern data pipelines. This role is ideal for a data engineer who thrives in a fast-paced environment and enjoys working with scalable cloud-native data architectures. 

You will be instrumental in building and orchestrating ETL/ELT workflows, managing data models, and enabling data insights for business users through reliable pipelines and infrastructure. 


【Responsibilities】

● Design, develop, and optimize data pipelines using AWS services such as: 
    ○ AWS Glue, Step Functions, Lambda, S3, Athena, Redshift, and CloudFormation 
● Implement and maintain scalable ETL/ELT frameworks and workflows. 
● Build and manage data lakes and data warehouse environments. 
● Collaborate with analytics and business teams to translate requirements into data solutions. 
● Write robust and reusable code in Python, SQL, and dbt. 
● Monitor and ensure data quality, availability, and pipeline reliability. 
● Maintain infrastructure as code using CloudFormation or Terraform (preferred). 
● Participate in troubleshooting, performance tuning, and pipeline optimization. 
● Support the team in dashboard data modeling and backend logic for tools like Tableau, QuickSight, or Power BI. 


【Qualifications & Skills 】

● Over 5 years of experience in data engineering with a focus on cloud-based data platforms. 
● Hands-on experience with AWS data services (Glue, Lambda, Step Functions, S3, Athena, Redshift). 
● Strong programming and scripting experience in Python and SQL. 
● Experience working with dbt for transformation logic (preferred). 
● Experience with Data Lake / Data Warehouse platforms (e.g., Snowflake, Databricks, Redshift). 
● Familiarity with CloudFormation, Terraform, or other IaC tools (a bonus). 
● Experience integrating with BI tools such as Tableau, QuickSight, or Power BI (preferred). 
● Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams. 
● Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.


【備註】
此職務須駐點至客戶端 (每周2-4天左右)，位於台北市南港區。

description:
Job Description
As a SMAI (Smart Manufacturing AI) OI (Operations Intelligence) – Scheduling and Simulation, Engineer, at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be part of Micron’s Smart Manufacturing Team comprised of world class talent to innovate End To End Digital Twin solutions through scheduling systems, simulation solutions and data analytics insights to guide and make Fab critical decisions. 
You will be partnering with different departments and the global network of manufacturing sites to enable breakthrough solutions in the business. If you possess a growth mindset and are passionate about providing intelligent and autonomous manufacturing solutions, join us as we evolve the way Micron does our business!

Responsibilities

Design and develop smart manufacturing and AI solutions in advanced factory scheduling, optimization and simulation that enable the achievement of industry leading manufacturing capability.
Develop high quality data analytics and applications that give insights and drive actions to enable management and manufacturing teams to make the right decisions.
Explore new frontier ideas, concepts and technology and apply it to Micron to enable breakthrough solutions.
Work with management, different departments, and global manufacturing sites to identify optimization opportunities and deliver solutions to continuously improve production metrics.
Drive global collaboration, alignment, and benchmarking of scheduling and simulation solutions.
Requirements

Drive to make a difference and passion to explore new frontiers!
Highly motivated, proactive, with a strong work ethic, able to work independently and collaborate effectively with people from different culture backgrounds.
Strong problem-solving skills with logical approach.
Masters/Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering, Operations Research, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Science, other technical disciplines, or equivalent professional work experience.
Programming language: proficient in C#, Python, SQL; experience with Snowflake, Visual studio, Tableau, GIT, Azure DevOps.
Knowledge and experience in optimization strongly preferred.
Knowledge and experience in machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning preferred.
Direct experience with factory scheduling, simulation, and application development preferred.
Able and willing to travel overseas

公司名稱: 美商賽美斯醫學科技有限公司
description:
▌Position Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated R Programmer to join our dynamic team focused on clinical trials. The successful candidate will play a key role in the development, validation, and analysis of R codes and packages tailored for clinical trial data. This position requires a strong background in statistical programming, data manipulation, and a proactive approach to problem-solving.

▌Key Responsibilities:
1. Code Development: 
    ? Actively participate in the development of R codes and packages specifically designed for clinical trials.

2. Validation: 
    ? Perform thorough validation of codes and analyses to ensure accuracy, reliability, and compliance with regulatory standards.

3. Programming Expertise: 
    ? Independently design, develop, and debug R programs ranging from simple to complex within defined project timelines.

4. Statistical Analysis: 
    ? Independently implement statistical analysis, data preparation, and data manipulation using R programs and packages.

5. Report Generation: 
    ? Independently create statistical tables, figures, and listings in R for clinical trial data, contributing to the production of high-quality reports.

6. Documentation: 
    ? Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for R programs, validation procedures, and results to facilitate transparency and reproducibility.

7. Collaboration: 
    ? Collaborate with cross-functional teams, providing programming support and expertise as needed.

8. Project Assistance: 
    ? Assist in the preparation of clinical/RWE study reports, manuscripts, and other scientific documents under the guidance of senior team members.

9. Adaptability: 
    ? Perform additional tasks as assigned, demonstrating flexibility and a proactive approach to evolving project needs.

▌Qualificaions:
‧	Advanced knowledge of R programming
‧	Strong understanding of biostatistical principles
‧	Highly detail oriented, results driven
‧	Good organizational, interpersonal, leadership and communication skills
‧	Ability to independently manage multiple tasks and projects
‧	Minimum BS (MS preferred) in Data Sciences, Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Sciences or related field.
‧	1+ years of experience in data sciences or research or drug industry using R.
‧	Experiences in R-shiny, SAS, Python, clinical trials are plus.
‧	Good documentation, communication and organization skills.
職稱: Clinical Data Scientist I

description:
About Us: 

VICI Holdings is a leading high-frequency trading firm seeking detail-oriented and talented professionals to join our innovative technology team.

As a Senior Data Engineer in the Data Analytics and Technology Division, you will lead efforts in data architecture optimization and data governance, support cross-functional data integration and platform scaling, and play a strategic role in advancing data analytics, quantitative research, and trading initiatives. 


Roles/ Responsibilities:

‧	Architecte and maintained low-latency, resilient data pipelines for high-frequency trading systems.
‧	Standardized cross-functional data formats and institutionalized governance (validation, anomaly detection, traceability).
‧	Led scalable data platform development, including access control and incident reporting.
‧	Delivered real-time, reliable, and observable data services for quant and research teams.
‧	Defined KPIs for data quality and efficiency (e.g., latency, alert precision, utilization).
‧	Assessed data-related risks and drove governance enhancements through systematic solutions.
‧	Mentored team members and optimized task distribution and feedback workflows.
‧	Managed daily operations of trading data infrastructure.

Required Skills: 
‧	5+ years of hands-on experience in data engineering.
‧	Experience in leading teams of 2+ members, supporting talent development and task delegation.
‧	Spearheaded data platform architecture or key cross-departmental projects with systematic tech implementation.
‧	Proficient in AI-assisted coding and Large Language Model (LLM) applications.
‧	Strong command of Linux system administration.
‧	Skilled in Python, C++, and SQL programming.
‧	Experienced with tools such as Airflow, Kafka, and Redis.
‧	Familiar with MySQL and AWS S3 (MinIO).
‧	Knowledgeable in CI/CD practices and Docker containerization.
‧	Detail-oriented, resilient under pressure, with strong logic and a focus on data quality.
‧	Demonstrates technical leadership and sound judgment; able to define problems and deliver innovative, actionable solutions in ambiguous scenarios.
‧	Experienced in financial trading systems.
‧	Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Preferred Qualifications:	
‧	Open-minded and enthusiastic about exploring and experimenting with new technologies.
‧	Strongly preferred: experience in data platform architecture, process optimization, and tech stack evaluation. 


Other Requirement:	
‧	Resilient, proactive, and optimistic, with strong critical thinking skills.
‧	Goal-oriented mindset, willing to put in the effort, and passionate about data research-related work.
‧	Strongly preferred: experience in data platform architecture, process optimization, and tech stack evaluation.


Interview Process (Process sequencing may be adjusted as appropriate)
Resume selection -->Coding Assessment ->  F2F or Google Meet Interview( Hiring team) --> HR Manager

About the Role and the Team

What You Will Do:

‧	Perform basic statistical analysis and data quality verification.
‧	Establish data quality monitoring mechanisms to ensure data accuracy and integrity.

What We’re Looking For

description:
【Job Description】
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated IT Data Engineer to join our team in Taiwan. This role involves designing, building, and maintaining scalable data pipelines, ensuring data reliability, and enabling insights that drive critical business decisions. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in distributed systems, database management, and data analytics tools, combined with a passion for innovation and continuous improvement.

【Responsibilities】
1.	Data Pipeline Development
	- Design, develop, and optimize scalable data pipelines using Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.
        - Ensure real-time and batch data processing pipelines meet business requirements.
2.	Database Management
        - Write complex SQL queries and manage RDBMS platforms such as Oracle, MSSQL, and PostgreSQL.
        - Implement and maintain data models and warehouses for analytics.
3.	Workflow Automation
        - Develop and maintain automated workflows using tools like Apache Airflow.
4.	Programming and Development
        - Build efficient and maintainable solutions using Python or Scala.
        - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate data solutions.
5.	Containerization and Deployment
        - Leverage Docker and Kubernetes to deploy and manage applications in a containerized environment.
6.	Data Visualization and Analytics
        - Create interactive dashboards and reports using Qlik, Tableau, or PowerBI.
7.	System Administration and Scripting
        - Perform Linux system administration and scripting to support data infrastructure.

【Skills】
1.     Essential:
        - Proven experience with distributed systems like Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.
        - Strong SQL skills and hands-on experience with Oracle, MSSQL, and PostgreSQL.
        - Proficiency in Python or Scala for data engineering tasks.
        - Experience with workflow schedulers like Apache Airflow.
        - Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, and containerization technologies.
        - Solid understanding of data modeling and warehousing principles.
        - Knowledge of Linux administration and shell scripting.
        - Expertise in using BI tools such as Qlik, Tableau, or PowerBI.
2.     Desirable:
        - Experience implementing lakehouse architectures and managing Iceberg tables on S3 object storage (a plus).
        - Ability to develop and deploy REST APIs and web services.
        - Familiarity with AI/ML pipelines and associated tools.
3.     Preferred Skills:
        - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
        - Effective communication and teamwork abilities.
        - Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with attention to detail.

description:
About the Opportunity:
We're seeking a highly motivated and experienced Data Engineer to join our growing team at BTSE. You will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and maintaining our data infrastructure, with a focus on cloud-based solutions. You will work closely with the Senior Data Engineer to ensure the efficient and reliable delivery of data to support various business needs.

Key Roles & Responsibilities:
●Design, implement, and maintain data infrastructure, including cloud-based solutions (AWS preferred).
●Develop and optimize ETL pipelines for performance, scalability, and reliability.
●Collaborate with the Senior Data Engineer to ensure data quality and integrity.
●Explore options to upgrade and replace existing systems to improve efficiency and reduce manual effort.
●Proactively identify and resolve data-related issues.
●Stay up-to-date with the latest data engineering technologies and best practices.

Qualifications:
●Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
●3+ years hands on experience in cloud technology and data engineering.
●Working experience in GIT, GitLab
●Strong knowledge of database design principles, backup and recovery strategies, security best practices, and performance tuning techniques.
●Proficiency in database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, or SQL Server.
●Solid experience with cloud-based database services (e.g., AWS RDS, Azure SQL Database) is preferred.
●Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
●Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
●(Mandatory) : Able to independently hit the ground running with development tasks.
職稱: Data Engineer

description:
【Job Description】

We are seeking a data scientist to address business challenges and fulfill the needs of the product team through data science and machine learning methodologies. This role involves transforming research outcomes—such as models or metrics derived from specific calculations—into scalable products, while also maintaining and supporting existing products.

【Responsibility】

- Define problems from a data science perspective based on business scenarios and propose actionable solutions derived from analytical results.
- Independently execute assigned development or experimental projects, including model training, feature extraction and transformation (ETL), and general analytical tasks.
- Communicate and explain our research projects to other cross-functional teams, ensuring stakeholders understand our deliverables and insights.

【Must Have】
1. A degree in mathematics, statistics, or a related field.
2. Proven experience in developing machine learning models and bringing them into production.
3. Practical experience in designing product performance evaluation metrics.

description:
▍Company Overview
At AlfredCamera, we believe in a user-centric approach that shapes our product philosophy. We're committed to fostering a logical and informed decision-making culture to enhance our app's core experience, innovate new features, and explore untapped opportunities across diverse markets. As our team continues to grow, we are now looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our team and support our diverse workforce.

▍Your Role
As a Senior Data Analyst at Alfred System, you will play a key role in scaling our data capability across multiple squads. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, user researchers, and machine learning experts, to turn data into actionable insights. Your work will directly impact product direction and user experience, helping us fulfill our mission to "Bring Peace of Mind to Everyone in the World."

In this era, you'll also contribute to building data-driven AI agents, an internal tool that automates insight generation, empower teams to self-serve answers, and accelerate decision-making at scale.

▍Responsibilities 
● Apply analytical methods and frameworks to evaluate product impact and guide strategic business decisions.

● Build and refine data AI agents to automate repetitive analysis tasks, enable self-service analytics, and amplify the data team's impact across the organization.

● Act as a trusted consultant to product teams and stakeholders to define OKRs, build insightful Amplitude dashboards, and uncover opportunities for growth.

● Visualize and communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences, empowering fast, confident decision-making.

● Collaborate with engineering teams to validate, structure, and maintain large-scale behavioral and system data.

● Work closely with user researchers to combine qualitative and quantitative methods into actionable user insights.

YAGEO Corporation, a leading global supplier of electronic components, is seeking an energetic, positive, and customer-focused individual to join our team as a mid-level Business Intelligence Developer. -Performance Optimization: Monitor and enhance reporting processes, ETL pipelines, and database queries to improve efficiency and reliability.

公司名稱: 博彥科技有限公司
description:
Overview 

As a Data Analyst at Microsoft, you will play a pivotal role in extracting actionable insights from data. Your work will directly impact decision-making processes, product development, and business strategies. If you’re passionate about data-driven solutions and enjoy translating raw information into meaningful narratives, this role is for you. 

Responsibilities 

Business Understanding and Anticipation: 

Proactively anticipate business questions by closely collaborating with stakeholders. Understand their needs and identify potential data-driven inquiries. 

Streamline Data Processes: 

Leverage Kusto Query to extract the data log from Cloud Apps/Services. 

Use tools to automate workflows and streamline data processes. 

Design and implement automated solutions to improve efficiency. 

Data Exploration and Cleaning: 

Dive into raw data from various sources. Profile and clean data to ensure accuracy and reliability. 

Apply data transformation techniques (aggregation, filtering, normalization) to prepare it for analysis. 

Data Modeling and Integration: 

Design scalable data models that accommodate growth and changing requirements. 

Determine optimal methods for integrating data from diverse sources (databases, APIs, flat files). 

Advanced Analytics and Visualization: 

Leverage tools like Power BI to create insightful visualizations. 

Develop interactive dashboards that provide real-time insights and facilitate data-driven decision-making. 

Implement advanced analytics techniques (modeling, clustering, trend analysis) to extract valuable insights. 

Ensure visualizations are user-friendly and accessible to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. 

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): 

Curate and maintain KPIs that track progress toward business goals. 

Develop dashboards and reports that provide a holistic view of performance metrics.

Job Description
As a SMAI (Smart Manufacturing AI) OI (Operations Intelligence) – Scheduling and Simulation, Engineer, at Micron Technology, Inc., you will be part of Micron’s Smart Manufacturing Team comprised of world class talent to innovate End To End Digital Twin solutions through scheduling systems, simulation solutions and data analytics insights to guide and make Fab critical decisions. 
You will be partnering with different departments and the global network of manufacturing sites to enable breakthrough solutions in the business. If you possess a growth mindset and are passionate about providing intelligent and autonomous manufacturing solutions, join us as we evolve the way Micron does our business!

Responsibilities

Design and develop smart manufacturing and AI solutions in advanced factory scheduling, optimization and simulation that enable the achievement of industry leading manufacturing capability.
Develop high quality data analytics and applications that give insights and drive actions to enable management and manufacturing teams to make the right decisions.
Explore new frontier ideas, concepts and technology and apply it to Micron to enable breakthrough solutions.
Work with management, different departments, and global manufacturing sites to identify optimization opportunities and deliver solutions to continuously improve production metrics.
Drive global collaboration, alignment, and benchmarking of scheduling and simulation solutions.
Requirements

Drive to make a difference and passion to explore new frontiers!
Highly motivated, proactive, with a strong work ethic, able to work independently and collaborate effectively with people from different culture backgrounds.
Strong problem-solving skills with logical approach.
Masters/Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering, Operations Research, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Science, other technical disciplines, or equivalent professional work experience.
Programming language: proficient in C#, Python, SQL; experience with Snowflake, Visual studio, Tableau, GIT, Azure DevOps.
Knowledge and experience in optimization strongly preferred.
Knowledge and experience in machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning preferred.
Direct experience with factory scheduling, simulation, and application development preferred.
Able and willing to travel overseas

■ 職位描述
1. 理解團隊（如行銷、營運等）需求並轉化為具體分析報告或儀表板，協助制定行動策略
2. 協助團隊共同設計新功能，包含上線前效益評估與上線後的資料驗證

4. 依據專案需求撰寫資料需求及規格說明，並於開發後驗證資料品質
5. 協助設計、執行與分析 A/B 測試，提出可行優化建議

■ 應徵條件
1. 1-2 年以上資料分析工作或實習經驗
2. 熟悉 SQL 或至少一種資料分析程式語言（如 Python、R 等），能獨立進行分析研究
3. 熟悉至少一種 BI 儀表板工具（如 QuickSight, Tableau, PowerBI, Looker Studio 等），可針對使用者需求進行設計與開發
4. 具備獨立思考、能主動提出分析建議與優化角度的能力
5. 具備良好的溝通能力與跨部門的合作經驗
6. 具備英文閱讀與基礎口語／書面表達能力以應對日常工作所需

■ 加分項目
1. 具備 B2C 金融科技或網路產業相關經驗
2. 具備 B2C 跨部門專案管理相關經驗
3.（Optional）可提供過去執行的「資料分析」或「模型應用」等專案資料作為審核參考，建議包含以下內容：
 - 研究問題描述
 - 分析架構與思考邏輯
 - 行動方案或研究成果



■ About the Team
At Net Protections (Taiwan), we serve millions of users with our innovative payment solutions, aiming to redefine industry standards and make financial services more accessible and secure for everyone.

We value a flat and flexible work culture where every team member is encouraged to take initiative and make an impact. If you're looking for a stage to help shape the future of FinTech, come join us!

■ Job Description
1. Translate cross-team (e.g. Marketing, Operations) needs into actionable data analysis reports or dashboards to support strategic decision-making.
2. Collaborate on new feature development by conducting pre-launch impact estimation and post-launch data validation.
3. Proactively lead exploratory analysis based on product goals and strategic direction, offering data-driven insights to stakeholders.
4. Define data requirements/specifications for development teams and validate data quality after implementation.
5. Design, execute, and analyze A/B tests, and provide optimization suggestions based on results.


■ Requirements
1. 1–2 years of experience (or internship) in data analysis.
2. Proficient in SQL and at least one data analysis language such as Python or R, capable of conducting independent analysis.
3. Familiar with at least one BI/dashboard tool (e.g. QuickSight, Tableau, Power BI, Looker Studio) and able to build dashboards based on user needs.
4. Strong critical thinking and ability to proactively provide insights and improvement suggestions.
5. Good communication skills and experience working with cross-functional teams.
6. Basic English communication ability (reading and writing), with the capability to participate in day-to-day English conversations (verbal or Slack communication).

■ Nice-to-Haves
1. Experience in B2C fintech startups or the internet/tech industry.
2. Proven experience managing cross-functional projects in a B2C environment. 
3. (Optional) Portfolio or project samples in data analysis or model application are welcome.  Suggested contents:
- Description of the problem or topic you addressed
- Your analytical approach and thought process
- Key actions taken or summary of outcomes

description:
Data analysis is the key to developing successful games and products. Rayark is looking for a savvy Data Analyst to join our data analysis team. You will use your solid data analysis skills to provide insights and feedback to game producers, designers and operations executives to help them make good decisions. The ideal applicant will have a passion for understanding business problems and goals. The applicant will also utilize data analysis technologies to improve game design and business development.

### RESPONSIBILITY
- Analyze and extract key insights and patterns from gameplay and behavior data of our players.
- Provides recommendations to game designers and producers according to the facts found from the data.
- Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand their data needs and translate business requirements into effective data analyses and actionable insights
- Research the latest data analysis techniques and trends and apply them to the company's business
- Perform data quality checks to ensure data accuracy and completeness
- Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for analyzing data and building business metrics.
- Work with data engineers to build effective ETL pipelines
- Design dashboards and visualize data

### REQUIREMENTS
- Master's Degree with a specialization in Statistics, Applied Math, Computer Science, Economics or in a related quantitative field or equivalent work experience.
- Experienced with statistical analysis approaches such as clustering, regression, and statistical inference.
- Familiar with SQL
- Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, Looker Studio
- Strong data processing, analysis, and interpretation skills
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Interested in studying user behavior and business problems
- Passion for games
- Familiar with A/B testing
- Excellent communication skills and a team player

### PLUSES
- Familiar with BigQuery or MongoDB
- Experienced with Python, CoLab, R, or other data discovering and visualization tools
- Data-driven decision making
- Relevant industry experience

### APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS
- Cover letter
- Resume
- Transcript (Applicants who recently graduated, just discharged from the army or have less than 1 years of work experience)

This role plays a key part in analyzing performance metrics, improving campaign efficiency, and providing actionable insights to improve client campaign performance. The ideal candidate will have a foundation in data analysis, with the ability to develop and implement strategies that optimize campaign results.

   business objectives.
‧ Analyze numbers from various different reports, and be able to identify patterns, 
   and picture outcomes and gaps and propose effective solutions to enhance 
   campaign performance.
‧ Compile and summarize key findings from performance data, highlighting business 
   impact and actionable insights.
‧ Communicate data insights clearly and effectively to stakeholders across the 
   organization.
‧ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver data-driven insights that 
   support strategic decision-making.

   implement improvements to enhance workflow efficiency.

   drive continuous improvement initiatives.


【Requirements】:

   analysis, and willing to learn and gather hands-on experience. 


【Must-Have Skills】:

   performance improvements.

【More About Onramp Lab】
Onramp Lab, the parent organization, is known for building brands with online-to-offline omnichannel marketing capabilities, especially in paid search, display, native, paid social, SEO, email and affiliate marketing across Google, Yahoo, Bing, Facebook, LinkedIn and more. Onramp professionals drive measurable value to multiple wholly owned and partnered companies through strategic guidance and subsequent execution in performance marketing, UX/CRO, and revenue optimization. Today, the Onramp Lab has organized a talented and strong Tech team to automatize success strategies and insight into software evolving into a technology-driven marketing/sales company.

description:
[Purpose of Role]

The Data Analyst is a member of our Project Services team, a multi-disciplinary team managing research projects from A to Z, from initial set-up to preparing client-ready deliverables. The Data Analyst is involved in actions and methods performed on data that help describe facts, detect patterns, develop explanations, and test hypotheses i.e., derive intelligence from the data. This is done using an array of tools, techniques, and frameworks that vary depending on the type of analysis being conducted. The four major types of analytics include: descriptive analytics (looks at data to examine, understand, and describe something that’s already happened), diagnostic analytics (goes deeper than descriptive analytics by seeking to understand the why behind what happened), predictive analytics (relies on historical data, past trends, and assumptions to answer questions about what will happen in the future), prescriptive analytics (aims to identify specific actions that an individual or organization should take to reach future targets). The position supports senior members of the team in analysing and reporting more complex and technical challenging projects. 

[Responsibilities and Duties]

Data quality assurance 
-Can independently identify and solve data issues on the projects.  
-Can troubleshoot and assist junior levels with issues on the projects.  
-Can ensure data integrity of large and complex datasets (e.g., multi-country, time series, etc.). 
 
Data handling 
-Able to independently process complex datasets.  
-Guide team members in managing and manipulating (restructuring, merging, computing, etc.) data.

Account management

Method management  
-Has a good understanding of different quantitative research methodologies and analyses techniques and are able to give advice to consultant teams.

-Understand implications (time & feasibility) of specific (change) requests and can recommend alternative solutions. 
Innovate new ways of processing & analysing data on existing projects.  
-Can set up technical manuals or a step-by-step guide on how to analyse custom / complex projects. 

Technical knowledge 
-Has a good knowledge of all the tools used for performing the key responsibilities. 
-Has advanced knowledge and experience of less frequently used reporting software such as Dapresy / eTabs.  
-Has a notion of programming languages such as R, Python, Scala, Java, SQL, Julia, MATLAB.

description:
Job Description

We are seeking a Senior Data Scientist with deep expertise in unstructured data (audio, speech, text, images, etc.) and a strong background in deploying Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI models at scale. This role focuses on real-world implementation, ensuring that models are efficient, scalable, and optimized for enterprise deployment.

You will work closely with large enterprises, delivering AI-powered solutions that meet real-world performance benchmarks (speed, latency, throughput). The ideal candidate has hands-on experience optimizing LLMs through quantization and pruning, designing distributed training pipelines, and working with AI agents to build end-to-end products beyond just leveraging open-source tools. This role requires a deep understanding of Large Language Models (LLMs), multimodal architectures, and cutting-edge optimization techniques such as quantization, pruning, model distillation, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

Key Responsibilities

Develop and deploy AI models for unstructured data (text, speech, audio, images) with a focus on enterprise-scale performance.

Fine-tune, optimize, and deploy LLMs and multimodal models, integrating distributed training, quantization, and pruning techniques for efficiency.

Design and implement production-ready AI solutions, ensuring scalability, low-latency inference, and high throughput.

Work with AI agents and automation frameworks to create intelligent, real-world AI applications for enterprise clients.

Build and maintain end-to-end LLM Ops pipelines, ensuring efficient training, deployment, monitoring, and model updates.

Implement vector search and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) systems for large-scale data solutions.

Monitor AI performance using key metrics such as speed, latency, and throughput, continuously refining models for real-world efficiency.

Work with cloud-based AI infrastructure (AWS, GCP) and containerized environments (Docker, Kubernetes) to scale AI solutions.

Collaborate with engineering, DevOps, and product teams to align AI solutions with business needs and client requirements.

Implement data curation pipelines, including data collection, cleaning, deduplication, decontamination, etc. for training high-quality AI models.

Implement self-instruct and synthetic data generation techniques to enrich datasets for low-resource languages and specialized domains.

Required Qualifications

5+ years of hands-on experience in AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science, with a strong focus on production-scale AI.

Expertise in LLMs, including fine-tuning, distributed training, quantization, and pruning techniques.

Experience working with OCR, ASR, and TTS applications in real-world deployments.

Proven experience deploying AI models in production, with real-world examples of scaled AI applications.

Strong understanding of cloud computing, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and ML Ops best practices.

Proficiency in Python, PyTorch, and ML libraries.

Hands-on experience with vector databases and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) architectures.

Strong awareness of AI system performance benchmarks (latency, speed, throughput) and ability to optimize models accordingly.

Experience working with AI agents, designing real-world intelligent automation solutions beyond just open-source experimentation.

Proficiency in transformer-based architectures (BERT, GPT, LLaMA, Whisper, etc.), including pre-training, fine-tuning, and task-specific adaptation.

Expertise in distributed training methodologies, including ZeRO-Offloading, Deep Speed, and FSDP.

Experience in large-scale data curation including data cleaning, formatting, deduplication, decontamination, etc.
職稱: Senior Data Scientist (Hybrid)

Additionally, you will create an automated data update pipeline and develop visualization tools. As a team member, you will work with cross-functional teams to integrate AI technologies into our drug discovery processes and mentor engineers to provide technical guidance and support.

What You'll Do :
o	Build large-scale drug and experiment-related databases, extract, transform, clean, normalize, and integrate data from different databases.
o	Support the team leader in creating training datasets for model development.
o	Collaborate with other teams to develop database visualization tools and create related APIs for AI engineers.
o	Perform statistical analysis of outliers and clustering using a background in medicinal chemistry
o	Establish the pipelines of automated data updates.

Minimum Qualifications :
o	Must have a background in biology or chemistry.
o	Proficiency in Python
o	Experience in handling and organizing related databases such as Chembl/PubChem, etc.
o	 Experience using FastAPI or other RESTful APIs.
o	Experience building PyTorch datasets/dataloaders
o	Familiarity with various chemical notations and the ability to understand different biochemical experiment theories and methods
o	Experience with multithreading and handling data on a billion-scale.
o	Have a strong ability of problem-solving and ability to collaborate and work as part of a team

Nice To Have :
o	Experience handling different types of drug data(Small molecular, Antibody …).
o	Familiarity with 3D structural data
o	Experience building DL/RL-related models or algorithms
o	Good debugging and performance profiling skills for Python

description:
We are looking for a Data Scientist to support analyzing indoor aquaculture and system behavior in order to help create the most efficient farms that the world has ever seen. In this role, using data mining, statistical techniques, and machine learning, you will be analyzing and visualizing data to help improve operational efficiency, minimize losses, increase yield. These combined goals will give Company’s produce global reach at an accessible price, leading to increased produce consumption and raising the quality of living around the world. You will be part of a passionate and dynamic team that is developing new technology from the ground up

What You'll Do

-Understand data needs and construct data pipelines that address gaps and provide new information about facility processes and performance
-Implement applications, dashboards, and statistical techniques to monitor process control tied to farm performance
-Define correlations between process inputs & outcomes to help improve yield rate, quality, and overall process
-Identify gaps in data to enable development of sensors, hardware, firmware and data pipelines
-Own and drive computational modeling 
-Systematic thinker who can balance multiple priorities and master new datasets quickly
-Background in computational modeling and data science
-Well versed in statistical analysis (SPC, DOE, ANOVA, regressions etc) and able to draw conclusions on the relationships between variables
-years of using dbt or other ETL methods to provide end-users with clean, transformed data
-years of expertise in using SQL to query messy datasets and to create data pipelines
-years of experience in R or Python (scripting languages) etc. to analyze data
-years of experience of creating informative & interactive data visualizations
-Experience integrating algorithms and data analyses with applications for end-users
-Strong documenter of maintainable code (version control, CI/CD, etc.), methods, and results
BS / MS or Ph.D in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Math or related degree with relevant experience)
職稱: Data scientist

description:
<About the job>
As the AI Project Manager and System Analyst, you'll join the various advanced Data Science & AI Projects in the corporate headquarters. In addition to developing intelligent applications via related AI and Advanced Data Analytics Technology for digital transformation, you will have plenty of opportunities to develop emerging AI applications based on different use cases and expand your tech skillset in this world-class company.

<Job Description>

*Type1：AI Project Manager
Manages AI-focused projects from initial planning to delivery, ensuring alignment with business goals and promoting innovation. Responsibilities include coordinating cross-functional teams, allocating and optimizing resources, and maintaining project schedules and budgets. The role requires proactive problem-solving to address project challenges and mitigate risks while driving effective communication across departments.
<Qualifications>
1. Over 5 years of experience in software project management, with a strong background in Agile methodologies.
2. Highly proactive, self-motivated, and accountable.
3. Willing and able to travel internationally for approximately 1-2 months per year.
<Required Skills>
1. Strong understanding of the project lifecycle, including planning, execution, monitoring, and closure.
2. Proven ability to manage project timelines, budgets, and resources effectively, ensuring projects are completed on schedule and within budget.t.
3. Ability to communicate effectively with individuals from different departments and roles and coordinate resources.
4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to swiftly assess complex issues and implement solutions.
5. Mastery of Microsoft Office programs (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)

(Nice to have, but not necessary)
1. Familiarity with manufacturing processes
2. Possession of project management certifications such as PMP or Scrum.
3. Intermediate or above English proficiency in listening, speaking, reading, and writing.


*Type 2：AI System Analyst
Responsible for gathering and analyzing the requirements and contributing to designing, developing, testing, and deploying in all phases of the AI system development project lifecycle, as below：
1. Collaborate with business data analysts to analyze user requirements and ensure that requirements and acceptance criteria satisfy user needs.
2. Create a system requirement specification to elaborate on system design, system components/interfaces, and data schema.
3. Work with the multi-functional engineering team(e.g., data scientist, AI/ML engineer, data engineer, AI software engineer..., etc.) to ensure technical feasibility.
4. Drive usability and quality of the AI system developed and ensure all system requirements are well implemented.
5. Work on various enterprise AI system applications and problems, and analyze issues to identify root causes and prevention.
6. Create the Wireframes(or UI Prototypes) for AI system feature discussion with users and provide them to the UI/UX design team.
7. Author and update internal documentation; initiate and deliver requirement specification and system analysis/system design documentation.
<Required Skills>
1. Practical experience in requirements gathering and analysis and change management
2. Experience co-working with front-end and back-end system development teams.
3. Strong analytical, verbal, and written communication, teamwork, and highly collaborative skills.
4. Experience with Microsoft Visio, Axure RP(or other wireframe tools).
5. Mastery of Microsoft Office programs (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)

(Nice to have, but not necessary)
1. Mastery of QA methodology and problem-solving tools/techniques in software engineering.
2. Knowledge of AI/Data Science Tech(e.g., Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Statistics, Quantitative modeling techniques).
3. Practical experience in Relational DB (e.g., MS SQL, PostgreSQL) and ability to write SQL queries.

description:
{Job Summary}

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in building and maintaining scalable data pipelines, optimizing data flow, and ensuring efficient data storage solutions. You will work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other engineers to support data-driven decision-making across the organization.

{Key Responsibilities}

- Design, develop, and maintain scalable ETL/ELT pipelines to process structured and unstructured data.
- Optimize and automate data pipelines for performance, reliability, and efficiency.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and ensure data availability.
- Develop and maintain data architecture, including databases, data lakes, and warehouses.
- Implement data governance policies and ensure data quality and security best practices.
- Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues, ensuring minimal downtime.
- Work with cloud-based data platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP to manage large-scale data processing.
- Document technical solutions and maintain up-to-date records of data engineering processes.

{Qualifications & Skills}

- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Science, or a related field.
- 3+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role.
- Proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.).
- Hands-on experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop, Kafka, etc.).
- Strong programming skills in Python, Scala, or Java.
- Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and data integration tools (e.g., Airflow, dbt).
- Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS (Redshift, Glue), Azure (Synapse, Data Factory), or GCP (BigQuery, Dataflow).
- Knowledge of data governance, data security, and compliance best practices.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.

{Nice to Have}

- Experience with real-time data processing and streaming solutions.
- Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
- Familiarity with CI/CD practices for data pipelines.

description:
工作內容：
<About the job>：
We're seeking AI/ML enthusiasts with experience and skills in working and are passionate about extending AI/ML expertise. The Data Science & AI team of headquarter IT is developing the frontier and practical analytic technologies that enhance the data value. As the AI/ML engineer, you'll join the AI/Big Data Analytics program/projects of headquarter IT and assist in building the model/algorithm to empower data-driven & analytics-driven for driving business value from data insights in this world-class company (Fortune Global 500, 22nd).

<Job Type Option：> 
*Type1: AI/ML Engineer (Engineering-Oriented) 
(1) Use Machine Learning/Deeping Learning/Analytical techniques to build models for internal different scenarios and requirements. 
(2) Building the model lifecycle from data exploration to feature engineering to model evaluation and validity analysis capabilities. 
(3) Execute efficient, scalable, automated processes for model development, model validation, and model implementation 
(4) Deploy the model to production and maintain/optimize the models by MLOps.
(5) Experience in Azure Data Lake, Azure Databricks, and Azure Data Factory is preferred.
(6) Experience in AWS SageMaker is preferred.

*Type2: NLP AI Engineer
(1) Focused on NLP Algorithm/Machine Learning & Deeping Learning for Text.
(2) Develop the Algorithm of NLP(Natural Language Processing)/ Computational Linguistics/Text Mining/Topic Modeling
(3) Join the project to build the end-to-end NLP systems, from understanding the requirements to selecting training datasets to model, evaluate, and deliver/deploy NLP models.
(4) Fine-tune LLMs and optimize and resolve issues related to LLM usage in production scenarios, enhancing reliability, accuracy, and performance.

*Type3: AI/ML Engineer (Analytics-Oriented)
(1)Use Machine Learning/Deeping Learning/Analytical techniques to build models for internal different scenarios and requirements.
(2)Build the model lifecycle, e.g., from data exploration to feature engineering to model evaluation and validity analysis capabilities.
(3)Execute efficient, scalable, automated processes for model development, model validation, and model implementation.
(4)Apply quantitative methods including but not limited to above tasks to solve business problems.
(5)Being passionate and patient about working with complex data


<Skills>
．Type1 & 3 : AI/ML Engineer(Engineering-Oriented & Analytics-Oriented) 
(1)Familiarity with any one of Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Deep Learning (Nature Language/Image/Time Series) model/algorithm building of the practical application in the industry.
(2) Being familiar with Python Libraries, e.g., Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, SciPy, Matplotlib, etc. 
(3)(For Engineering-Oriented) Knowledge of Big Data with Machine Learning/Statistical modeling related technologies such as Spark MLlib or PySpark or SparkR/SparklyR. 
(4)(For Analytics-Oriented) Knowledge of Deep Learning Framework such as TensorFlow/Caffe/Pytorch/Keras.

．Type 2: NLP AI Engineer
(1) Experience with text mining algorithms such as word segmentation, POS tagging, named entity recognition...etc. 
(2) Experience in algorithms and libraries of NLP(Natural Language Processing), especially in machine learning techniques applied to NLP, such as Text mining, Text classification, Information Extraction, Keyword Tagging, and content discovery.
(3) Familiar with one general-purpose programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C/C++)

description:
Job Summary:
    The Statistician/Data Scientist will be responsible for all advanced statistical methods utilized for improving product quality, production yield, and factory effectiveness as well as finding the root-causes, along with other consulting services such as customer targeting and lead scoring in support of sales and marketing activities worldwide.

Key Responsibilities:
‧ Design, implement, and refine advanced statistical/Machine Learning models to support product quality improvement, increasing yield and factory effectiveness.
‧ Cultivate strong relationships with production line engineers, IT, and other key stakeholders to ensure alignment of modeling initiatives with company objectives and to identify new hypotheses for model improvements.
‧ Scale out modeling capacity by driving infrastructure improvements such as automation of data preparations, model training, implementation, and optimization.
‧ Support integration of models into tools for use by product engineers and business analysts.
‧ Engage with customers to develop and customized data analytics solutions to address special needs.
‧ Address ad hoc queries from management and present actionable recommendations in a clear, concise, and convincing manner.
‧ Communicate the application and benefits of using various predictive modeling techniques to improve decision-making to customers and stakeholders.
‧ Collaborate effectively with team members, whether leading projects or supporting initiatives led by others. 
‧ Provide direction, training, and guidance to less experienced team members.

公司名稱: P＆G_寶僑家品股份有限公司
description:
The Product Supply Team is seeking a skilled Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. The primary purpose of this role is to clean and synchronize business data, driving data flow simplification and synchronization. Additionally, the Data Engineer will play a crucial role in optimizing the planning forecast process to enhance forecast accuracy, ultimately contributing to category growth.

Your Role Specialty Areas : In this role, the individual will ;
1.  Data Cleaning and Synchronization:
- Develop and implement data cleaning processes to ensure data integrity and accuracy.
- Design and maintain data pipelines to synchronize business data across various systems and platforms.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to identify data quality issues and establish solutions.
- Design and build ETL pipelines to extract, transform, and load data from SAP ERP systems (e.g., CDS Views, OData APIs, BAPIs).

2.  Data Flow Simplification:
- Analyze existing data flows and recommend simplifications to improve efficiency.
- Work with cross-functional teams to streamline data processes and enhance data accessibility.
- Implement best practices in data management and governance.
- Work closely with IT teams to access SAP data sources, independently explore table structures (e.g., MARA, EKPO, BKPF), and integrate business-critical data into the enterprise data warehouse
   
3.  Forecasting Optimization:
- Collaborate with planning and commercial teams to enhance forecasting models and processes.
- Utilize statistical methods and machine learning techniques to improve forecast accuracy.
- Monitor and analyze forecasting performance, providing insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.

4.  Documentation and Reporting:
- Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for data processes, models, and systems.
- Develop reports and dashboards to communicate findings and support data-driven decision-making.
 
What we offer you: 
- You will have business responsibilities from Day 1 – You will start of meaningful work from the beginning. Over time, as you expand your impact on the business, your responsibility and ownership will also quick grow.
- You will receive continuous coaching & mentorship– We are passionate about our work. We will make sure you receive both formal training and as regular mentorship from your manager and others.
- You will work in a dynamic and respectful work environment – We live our Purpose, Values, and Principles daily. We value every individual and encourage initiatives promoting agility and work/life balance.
 
Develop scalable data models to support Power BI dashboards for supply chain, sales, and inventory analytics.
Ensure data quality through automated validation, monitoring, and documentation of data pipelines and business rules.
Collaborate with IT, data science, and business teams to bridge SAP systems with analytics platforms, contributing to cross-functional technical discussions and code reviews.
 
What we are looking for:  
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field
- Proven experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role, preferably in supply chain or business process intelligence
- Experience with SAP data 
- Exposure to Generative AI technologies and agentic workflows is a plus, including tools[RL1]  such as Cursor, Windsurf, CrewAI, LangChain, or Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) frameworks for automating data integration, processing, and analytics enhancement.
- Strong proficiency in SQL and experience with data manipulation and ETL processes.

公司名稱: 街口電子支付股份有限公司
description:
【THE ROLE & THE TEAM】
As the Data Team Lead at JKOPay, you will take on a leadership role in managing and mentoring the Data Engineering team. You will be responsible for overseeing the design, development, and maintenance of JKOPay’s data systems, including both real-time and batch processing. With JKOPay handling over 3 billion transactions monthly for more than 6 million users in Taiwan, your leadership will be crucial in ensuring data accuracy, scalability, and efficiency.

A significant aspect of this role involves infrastructure planning and development. You will lead the team in architecting and optimizing data infrastructures to ensure scalability, high availability, and performance across multiple platforms and environments. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, you will guide the implementation of infrastructure solutions that support the rapid growth of JKOPay’s business and evolving data needs.

This is a strategic position that will allow you to shape the future of JKOPay's data infrastructure while supporting the growth of the team and organization.

【WHY YOU SHOULD BE INTERESTED】
-Lead and mentor a team of data engineers in building and maintaining scalable ETL pipelines, ensuring data integrity and security.
-Drive infrastructure planning and design for data platforms to ensure performance, scalability, and reliability.
-Collaborate with business and engineering teams to define data requirements, design data models, and drive the development of data products.
-Lead efforts in optimizing data systems for performance, scalability, and cost-efficiency across multiple environments, including cloud (GCP) and on-premises data centers.
-Oversee the entire lifecycle of data projects, from conception to deployment, ensuring timely and high-quality delivery.
-Take ownership of the continuous improvement of JKOPay’s data infrastructure and engineering practices to meet the needs of a rapidly growing business.
-Provide technical guidance on the adoption of new technologies and data platforms to drive innovation in the team.

【WE'D LOVE TO MEET YOU IF】
-You have 5+ years of relevant experience in data engineering, including at least 2 years of team leadership or mentorship experience.
-Proven track record of designing, building, and maintaining complex ETL pipelines with a focus on scalability, reliability, and security.
-Strong proficiency in backend development with expertise in shell scripting, SQL, and at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Scala).
-Expertise in distributed computing engines and platforms (e.g., ClickHouse, PySpark, Kafka, BigQuery, Airflow).
-Demonstrated experience in planning and implementing infrastructure for large-scale data processing and storage solutions.
-Familiarity with data exploration and visualization tools (e.g., Superset, Tableau) and experience in implementing data lake and data warehouse architectures.
-Practical experience with cloud-based data processing solutions (e.g., AWS Data Pipelines, GCP Dataflow).
-Practical experience with CDC (Capture Data Change) tools and methodologies, or any other streaming solutions.
-Experience in managing stakeholders at different levels, with excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
-Previous experience in setting up or utilizing Data Catalogs is a plus.
-Passion for team development, fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture.
職稱: Data Engineering Team Lead
專長工具: Shell, Python, Scala, Data Modeling, ETL, MS SQL, MySQL, Tableau

description:
【Job Responsibilities】
‧ 領導並培育資料工程團隊，建置並維運穩健且具擴展性的 ETL 流程，並堅守資料完整性與資訊安全的最佳實務。
‧ 主導資料平台的規劃與架構設計，確保在瞬息萬變的業務需求下，維持高效能、高擴充性與營運穩定性。
‧ 與業務與工程團隊密切合作，蒐集資料需求、設計具韌性的資料模型，並加速資料驅動解決方案的開發與部署。
‧ 優化雲端（如 GCP）與地端基礎架構中的資料生態系，聚焦於提升系統效率、擴展能力與成本效益。
‧ 全面管理資料專案生命週期，從構想到落地實施，確保專案準時交付，兼顧品質與創新。
‧ 持續推動資料基礎設施與工程標準的進化，為組織未來成長奠定穩固基石。
‧ 提供技術領導，評估並導入新興資料技術，營造創新、敏捷與持續改善的團隊文化。

【Requirements】
‧ 至少五年資料工程相關工作經驗，並具兩年以上領導或輔導團隊經驗。
‧ 擁有設計、建置與維護複雜 ETL 流程的豐富經歷，著重於可擴展性、韌性與安全性。
‧ 具備紮實的後端開發能力，熟悉 Shell scripting、SQL 及至少一種現代程式語言（如 Python、Scala）。
‧ 深入理解分散式運算引擎與資料平台（如 ClickHouse、PySpark、Kafka、BigQuery、Airflow）。
‧ 成功規劃與部署大規模資料處理與儲存基礎建設的經驗。
‧ 熟悉資料探索與視覺化工具（如 Superset、Tableau），並具備資料湖與資料倉儲架構的實務知識。
‧ 具備雲端原生資料處理服務（如 AWS Data Pipelines、GCP Dataflow）操作經驗。
‧ 熟悉資料變更擷取（CDC）工具與即時串流解決方案者尤佳。
‧ 優異的利害關係人管理與溝通能力，能有效跨部門協作與影響決策。
‧ 曾參與建置或運用資料目錄（Data Catalog）系統者為加分條件。
‧ 熱衷於人才培育，樂於打造高績效、協作並充滿創新的團隊文化。

【Benefits】
‧ 舒適的辦公環境。
‧ 便利的上班地點－捷運站五分鐘距離。
‧ 彈性的上下班（09:00-18:00 / 10:00-19:00），午休1.5小時。
‧ 專案獎金、節日禮金、生日禮金、人才推薦獎金。
‧ 專業在職培訓。
‧ 正職福利計劃。
‧ 零食飲料咖啡供應。
‧ 到職第一年享10天特休、10天全薪病假。(依職等可議)
‧ 壽星當月生日假。
